ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Berthold would like you to know that it took him 1 hour and 15 minutes to go from Steamfont to High Hold Pass last night.  This is without any speed
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:00 PM 7/14/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>remember my average ping is around 500-600? I take about 2 minutes to zone
>max, but 15 to cross W Karana alone. I definitely can't run from docks to
>Kaladim in anywhere near one minute, but will time it tonite to be sure as
>that's where I'm headed anyhow. I suspect more like three minutes though.
>

Berthold would like you to know that it took him 1 hour and 15 minutes to
go from Steamfont to High Hold Pass last night. This is without any speed
enhancing spells, and the only magic used was gate and invisibility (gate
returned him from the Keep to Steamfont.) This included several side-trips
to play Mr. Postman on the Bardic FedEx quests., which, btw, netted about 2
plat. Cheap night.
Keep in mind that he knew exactly where he was going, didn't have to wait
more than 5 minutes for the boat, and had no zone-crashes.
Average zone-time seemed a bit longer than others, but maybe that's just
subjective.

Talies for Berthold

"It's a small virtual world after all."
